name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Edgar J. HUDSON, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Edgar J. HUDSON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Seymore H. Johnson, Jr., Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 332
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Edgar J. HUDSON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 6, 1982.
Decided Dec. 29, 1982.
Seymore H. Johnson, Jr., Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
